text: Chantal Brunel (born 9 September 1948) was the mayor of Bussy-Saint-Georges from 2014 until 2016. She was a member of the National Assembly of France until 2012. She represented the Seine-et-Marne department. She was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. Appointed head of the equality office, she is a staunch supporter of liberalisation of laws against sex work in France.. She is of Greek ancestry. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:French people of Greek descent Category:Liberal Democracy (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Mayors of places in Île-de-France Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Women mayors of places in France Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Chantal Brunel
